resources.string: Confirm the prefix of your country and enter your phone number.
The number or prefix entered is incorrect
If the entered number is correct , before long you will receive an SMS with the code on your device. Enter it.

This code does not correspond to the phone number entered previously. Ensure that the phone number and code are correct.
The code is incorrect. This has to have a length of 4 letters or numbers.
Do you want to exit the application?
If there is any problem with the data, please contact us:
You have no mail client configured on this device. Sets one or contact us via phone
The internet connection is not available, connect to and press OK
There are problems connecting to servers, try again later
Enter your daily pressures-three measurements per time slot
To save the data need to fill in all fields for this time slot
To send pressures have to fill both slots. If only one , click save button to save the pressures of a slot button.
There are problems sending pressures, try again later
New video is available in Videos section
There are no videos available to display.
There is not record in history
The pressures of today have already been introduced
App needs GPS enable for maps and location
Principal menu icon created by Amit Jakhu
under license CC BY 3.0, downloaded from
Map type icon is created by Icons8
under license CC BY 3.0, downloaded from
The rest of icons are created by Freepik
under license CC BY 3.0, downloaded from
The background fragment in chat and background messages are created by
The lateral menu icons are natives from Android.

To add your daily pressures , you have to go to paragraph blood pressures or directly from the shortcut on the main menu " Add pressures."\n\nThe pressure screen consists of two parts , add measurements in the morning and afternoon add measurements .
Each line of empty fields represents a measurement(systolic pressure , diastolic pressure and pulse).

When each strip is complete with its 3 measurements corresponding can save your settings , this way you can save Fringe morning to send 2 slots for the evening when the Gaza evening is completed and this all ready . You can switch from one band to another without the content always clear that they do not exit the application without saving data \n \n NOTE : In a band you can save your settings as long as are entered 3 measurements. CAN SEND ONLY WHEN RESULTS ARE TWO FULL STRIP .
If any of the data shown in the profile is not correct, you can change them in the Contact section by sending an email notifying the error and the data will be modified as soon as possible.
